summary: Completed comprehensive backend and frontend testing of duty scheduler assignment system. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend displays assignments correctly, but critical UI integration bug found in 'Add Personnels' button click handler.

ui_bugs.issue: 'Add Personnels' button click does not trigger handleAddPersonnels function - no API call made when button clicked

integration_issues.issue: E2E flow broken - personnel selection works but assignment creation button non-functional

issues: HTML hydration errors in console for select/option elements with span wrappers

passed_tests: Frontend: Page loads and calendar grid displays correctly
Frontend: Side panel opens when clicking time cells
Frontend: Personnel selection UI works (shows 'Selected' state)
Frontend: Assignment blocks render properly when assignments exist
Frontend: Close button on side panel works correctly
Frontend: Time selectors and All Day toggle present and functional
Integration: Direct API-created assignments appear immediately in calendar grid
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix 'Add Personnels' button click handler in DutySlotPanel.js - the handleAddPersonnels function is not being executed when button is clicked. All other functionality works perfectly including backend APIs (100% success) and frontend display of assignments. The button appears enabled and shows correct selection count, but onClick event is not triggering the assignment creation API call.
